participant_abstract.sent: The design of the remote control was firmed up it terms of basic concept, technical content and target market.

All members participated in the discussion and, with the aid of market research identified a product that would stand out from the rest and could be updated to meet the changing taste of the consumer whilst remaining reliable over its lifetime.
